sentences.sCn: 琼斯的活动搞得很成功。

sentences.sContent: Police have launched a campaign to crack down on drug dealers.
sentences.sCn: 警方发起了一场严厉打击毒贩的运动。

sentences.sContent: The allies are intensifying their air campaign.
sentences.sCn: 盟军在加强他们的空中军事活动。

sentences.sContent: a group campaigning against the destruction of the rain forests
sentences.sCn: 发起运动反对破坏热带雨林的团体

synos.tran: 作战；参加竞选；参加活动

phrases.pCn: 战役模式；完成任务模式

words.tran: 竞选者；从军者；出征者；老兵

remMethod.val: camp (野营地) + aign → 战役； 活动

trans.tranOther: a series of actions intended to achieve a particular result relating to politics or business, or a social improvement
to lead or take part in a series of actions intended to achieve a particular social or political result
